setting.value:
We'd like to take this opportunity to wish a [COLOR white]Happy New Year[/COLOR] to all of our friends around the world, peace and prosperity for all.
It would probably be a good idea to check out the EarthCam addon tonight, you'll be able to watch live HD footage from Times Square and other landmarks worldwide.
Find information on EarthCam and how-to watch the Ball Drop live: [B][COLOR white]www.tvaddons.ag/nye2016/[/COLOR][/B]
Thank you to everyone who has been there throughout the past year, and cheers to the developers for making this all possible!
